name: The Six Million Dollar Man Fangame
name_original: The Six Million Dollar Man Fangame
description:
Six Million Dollar Man - The Fan Game

You become Steve Austin, the bionic man in some of his most challenging missions in this top-down action/adventure style game by Jeffrey Jene. Favorite viewer episodes from this iconic 1970's television show have been selected:

  • The Moon and the Desert
  • Doomsday and Counting
  • The Bionic Woman
  • The Secret of Bigfoot
  • Death Probe

Take on Steve's most dangerous adversaries and save the world (and possibly others)!

There is a very small demo up now to demonstrate the game play, style and mechanics. Regular updates will be made.

Note: This is a fan game and will be given away at no charge.
